00020     inline void makeGateTableSlope();
00021     inline void make_parameter1(Real v,int index);
00022     Real **_gateTable;  //[129001][14];// 290001 = (200+90)/.001 + 1
00023     Real **_gateTableSlope;// [129001][14];
00024 
00026     LuoRudyGateTable(){
00027       Gna=12.00;
00028       Gsi=0.09; // correct value
00029       //Gsi =0.01; // use this for spiral
00030       c_K0=5.4;
00031       GK=.282*sqrt(c_K0/5.4);
00032       
00033       c_Nai=18.0;
00034       c_Na0=140.0;
00035       c_Ki=145.0;
00036       RT_F=26.73;
00037       E_Na=RT_F*log(c_Na0/c_Nai);
00038       E_K=RT_F*log((c_K0+.01833*c_Na0)/(c_Ki+.01833*c_Nai));
00039       E_K1=RT_F*log(c_K0/c_Ki);
00040       E_kp=E_K1;
00041       G_K1=.6047*sqrt(c_K0/5.4);
00042       
00043       _gateTable = new Real*[290001];
00044       
00045       for(int i = 0; i < 290001; ++i){
00046     _gateTable[i] = new Real[14];
00047       }
00048 #ifdef _USE_GATE_SLOPE
00049       _gateTableSlope = new Real*[290000];
00050       for(int i = 0; i < 290000; ++i){
00051     _gateTableSlope[i] = new Real[14];
00052       }
00053 #endif
00054       makeGateTable();
00055       
00056     }
00057          
00058     Real Gna,Gsi,c_K0,GK;
00059     Real Es;
00060     Real i_na,i_si,i_k,i_tot;
00061     Real c_Na0,c_Nai,c_Ki,RT_F;
00062     Real E_Na, E_K,E_K1,E_kp,G_K1; 
00063 };

00067 void LuoRudyGateTable::makeGateTable(){
00068 
00069   for(int index=0; index<290001; index++){    
00070     Real v = -90 + 0.001*index;
00071     make_parameter1(v,index);
00072   }
00073 
00074 #ifdef _USE_GATE_SLOPE
00075   makeGateTableSlope();
00076 #endif
00077 
00078   return;
00079 }
00080

00082 
00083 void LuoRudyGateTable::makeGateTableSlope(){
00084 
00085   for(int index=0; index<290000; index++){
00086     for(int i =0;i<14; i++){
00087       _gateTableSlope[index][i] = (_gateTable[index+1][i] -_gateTable[index][i] )*1000;
00088     }
00089   }
00090 
00091   return;
00092 }
00093 
00094 
00095 void LuoRudyGateTable::get_parameters(Real v,Real tab[]){
00096 
00097   int index = (v + 90)*1000;
00098 
00099 #ifdef _USE_GATE_SLOPE
00100   Real delv = v -(-90 + 0.001*index); 
00101   for(int i=0; i<14; i++){
00102     tab[i] = _gateTableSlope[index][i]*delv + _gateTable[index][i];
00103   }  
00104 #else 
00105   Real delVbydT = 1000*(v -(-90 + 0.001*index)); 
00106   for(int i=0; i<14; i++){
00107     tab[i] = (_gateTable[index+1][i] -_gateTable[index][i] )*delVbydT + _gateTable[index][i];
00108   }
00109 #endif
00110 }

00112 //void LuoRudyGateTable::make_parameter1(Real v,Real tab[]){
00113 void LuoRudyGateTable::make_parameter1(Real v, int index){
00114     Real beta1,beta2,beta3;
00115     
00116     Real alpha_m, beta_m,alpha_h,beta_h,alpha_j,beta_j;
00117     Real alpha_d, beta_d,alpha_f,beta_f,alpha_x,beta_x;
00118     Real alpha_k1,beta_k1,k1_inf,kp,I_k1,I_kp,I_b,I_total;
00119     Real m_inf,h_inf,j_inf,d_inf,f_inf,x_inf;
00120     Real tao_m,tao_h,tao_j,tao_d,tao_f,tao_x,x1;
00121 
00122     if (fabs(v+47.13)<0.001) {
00123         alpha_m=3.2;
00124     }else{
00125         alpha_m=0.32*(v+47.13)/(1.0-exp(-0.1*(v+47.13)));
00126     }
00127     beta_m=0.08*exp(-v/11.);
00128     if (v>-40.) {
00129         alpha_h=0;
00130         alpha_j=0;
00131         beta_h=1./(0.13*(1+exp(-(v+10.66)/11.1)));
00132         beta_j=0.3*exp(-2.535e-7*v)/(1+exp(-0.1*(v+32)));
00133     }else{
00134         alpha_h=0.135*exp(-(80+v)/6.8);
00135         alpha_j=(-1.2714e5*exp(0.2444*v)-3.474e-5*exp(-0.04391*v))*(v+37.78)/(1+exp(0.311*(v+79.23)));
00136         beta_h=3.56*exp(0.079*v)+3.1e5*exp(0.35*v);
00137         beta_j=0.1212*exp(-0.01052*v)/(1+exp(-0.1378*(v+40.14)));
00138     } 
00139      
00140     alpha_d=.095*exp(-.01*(v-5))/(1+exp(-.072*(v-5)));
00141     beta_d=.07*exp(-.017*(v+44))/(1+exp(.05*(v+44)));
00142     alpha_f=.012*exp(-.008*(v+28))/(1+exp(.15*(v+28)));
00143     beta_f=.0065*exp(-.02*(v+30))/(1+exp(-.2*(v+30)));
00144     alpha_x=.0005*exp(.083*(v+50))/(1+exp(.057*(v+50)));
00145     beta_x=.0013*exp(-.06*(v+20))/(1+exp(-.04*(v+20)));
00146     tao_m=alpha_m+beta_m;
00147     m_inf=alpha_m/tao_m;
00148     tao_h=alpha_h+beta_h;
00149     h_inf=alpha_h/tao_h;
00150     tao_j=alpha_j+beta_j;
00151     j_inf=alpha_j/tao_j;
00152     tao_d=(alpha_d+beta_d);
00153     d_inf=alpha_d/(alpha_d+beta_d);
00154     tao_f=(alpha_f+beta_f);
00155     f_inf=alpha_f/(alpha_f+beta_f);
00156     tao_x=(alpha_x+beta_x);
00157     x_inf=alpha_x/(alpha_x+beta_x);
00158     if  (v>-100) {
00159         if  (fabs(v+77.)<0.001) {
00160             x1=0.608889;
00161         }else{
00162             x1=2.837*(exp(0.04*(v+77))-1)/((v+77)*exp(0.04*(v+35)));
00163         }
00164     }else{
00165         x1=1.;
00166     }
00167     alpha_k1=1.02/(1+exp(0.2385*(v-E_K1-59.215)));
00168     beta1=0.49124*exp(0.08032*(v-E_K1+5.476));
00169     beta2=exp(0.06175*(v-E_K1-594.31));
00170     beta3=1+exp(-0.5143*(v-E_K1+4.753));
00171     beta_k1=(beta1+beta2)/beta3;
00172     k1_inf=alpha_k1/(alpha_k1+beta_k1);
00173     I_k1=G_K1*k1_inf*(v-E_K1);
00174     kp=1./(1+exp((7.488-v)/5.98));
00175     I_kp=0.0183*kp*(v-E_K1);
00176     I_b=0.0392*(v+59.87);
00177     _gateTable[index][0]=m_inf;
00178     _gateTable[index][1]=tao_m;
00179     _gateTable[index][2]=h_inf;
00180     _gateTable[index][3]=tao_h;
00181     _gateTable[index][4]=j_inf;
00182     _gateTable[index][5]=tao_j;
00183     _gateTable[index][6]=d_inf;
00184     //c     tab[8]=tao_d*10.0
00185     _gateTable[index][7]=tao_d;
00186     _gateTable[index][8]=f_inf;
00187     //c     tab[10]=tao_f*10.0
00188     _gateTable[index][9]=tao_f;
00189     _gateTable[index][10]=x_inf;
00190     _gateTable[index][11]=tao_x;
00191     _gateTable[index][12]=x1;
00192     _gateTable[index][13]=I_k1+I_kp+I_b;
00193     return;
00194 }
